executable.title: Convert DICOM Segmentation Image into ITK image(s)
executable.description: This tool can be used to convert DICOM Segmentation into volumetric segmentations stored as labeled pixels using research format, such as NRRD or NIfTI, and meta information stored in the JSON file format.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported in part the National Institutes of Health, National Cancer Institute, Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) program, grant Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) (U24 CA180918, PIs Kikinis and Fedorov).
